description: Refit of Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Amundsen located in Quebec, QC
full_summary:
===============

**Title**
--------

F3065-230373-2: CCGS Amundsen Refit - Fall 2023 Request for Proposal

**Reference Number**
-------------------

WS4266910751-Doc4312249664

**Solicitation Details**
----------------------

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4266910751
* **Publication Date**: 2023-11-16
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-22T14:00:00 (expired)

**Contract Overview**
-------------------

This Solicitation Cancels and Supersedes Previous Bid Solicitation
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), is issuing this Solicitation for the acquisition of Ship Repair Work on the CCGS Amundsen, located in Quebec, QC. The contract is expected to commence on 2023-11-10 and end on 2024-11-10.

**Acquisition Details**
----------------------

* **Goods/Services Required**: Commercial marine craft, specifically an Icebreaker
* **Regions of Opportunity**: *Québec
* **Regions of Delivery**: *Québec

**Contracting Entity**
--------------------

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* **End User Entities**: Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), 200 Kent St. Station 13E228, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Name**: Simoneau, Steve (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: steve.simoneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
